title: Spicy Sriracha-Soy Drizzle
description: Bold and spicy sriracha-soy dressing perfect for adding heat and umami to salads, bowls, or as a dipping sauce
instructions: In a small bowl, combine Greek yogurt (or vegan yogurt) and sriracha.
Add soy sauce and rice vinegar, mixing well.
Stir in honey or maple syrup until fully incorporated.
Add water gradually, 1 teaspoon at a time, until desired consistency is reached.
Taste and adjust sriracha for heat level and other seasonings as needed.
Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 3 days.
notes: This dressing is perfect for Asian-inspired salads, grain bowls, or as a dipping sauce. Adjust sriracha to your heat preference - start with 1 tbsp and add more if you want it spicier. The vegan yogurt version works great for plant-based diets. Water helps thin it to a pourable consistency.
